title: ISic030259. ISic030259
body:
Facsimile Images

|a 1[.]ΕΠΠ[.]ΙΝΑΣ
2ΚΕΦΑΛΟΣ
3ͰΥΙΟΣ |b
4ͰΟΓΔΟΑ´

Apparatus criticus

Text after Cordano 1992

English translation

Italian translation

commentary

This document is one of a large deposit (c. 150) of lead tesserae found in a storeroom of Athena's sanctuary at the archaeological site of Kamarina. The structure of this tessera can be compared to others from the same deposit in which the onomastic formula features the word ͱυιός preceded by a double nominative, which Masson (quoted by Cordano 1992, p. 55) assumed to be a form of asyndeton (see also ISic030199) and ISic030236).

bibliography

  • Cordano 1992 131 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002437
